title: [1.7.3]红石电缆 RedPower【更新至V1.7.1】增加工具等
author: huhu呼呼
txt_content:
本帖最后由 huhu呼呼 于 2011-10-4 08:49 编辑 

RedPower V1.7.1可以爬墙挂天花板，不用担心被水冲走，不用担心互相干扰，255格传送距
[white_wool][lightgrey_wool][grey_wool][black_wool][yellow_wool][orange_wool][pink_wool][red_wool][magenta_wool][purple_wool][lightblue_wool][cyan_wool][blue_wool][lime_wool][green_wool][brown_wool]ps：很难打包，建议用V1.6.0
相对于V.1.6.0更新一下内容：
wiring 布线新增工具：锯子铁锯可以削软质材料，而钻石锯几乎削所有的东西。                        



主要使用方式：



（也可以用于装饰）


[orange_wool]同时还可以回收哦[orange_wool]


[lime_wool]还支持保护套[lime_wool]
合成方法:




新增阵列

Parts零件
To make the more advanced array circuits, you need to start with parts.
为了使更先进的阵列电路，你需要开始与部分。

Stone Redwire:


By supporting red alloy wire instead of simply baking redstone into the substrate, a stone redwire can convey signals at full strength to and from the outside world.
可以充分传送外界信号，而不是简单的红石基板
Plate Assembly:


Working on the same principles as a stone anode, a red alloy plate assembly is capable of converting red rays into redstone current. The difference is that a plate assembly is capable of vertical signal transmission.
与石头阳极相同的原则，一个红色的合金板组件是红石电流转换成红色光线的能力。不同的是，能够垂直信号传输板组装。


Cells储存格

Null Cell:


The null cell performs no logic function, simply acting as a crossover for two red alloy wires.

Invert Cell:


The invert cell acts as two crossing wires with an invert function. When the lower wire is unpowered, the upper wire gets powered. When the lower wire is powered, the upper wire is returned to its natural state.
空单元格不执行的逻辑功能，只是作为两个红色的合金线的交叉时使用。

Non-Invert Cell:


The non-invert cell acts as two crossing wires with a buffer function. When the lower wire is powered, the upper wire gets powered. When the lower wire is unpowered, the upper wire is returned to its natural state.

反转单元格作为两个过境线反转功能。当低线是无动力，上线获得供电。当低线供电，上线返回到其自然状态。


Non-Invert Cell:


The non-invert cell acts as two crossing wires with a buffer function. When the lower wire is powered, the upper wire gets powered. When the lower wire is unpowered, the upper wire is returned to its natural state.

非反转两个过路电线具有缓冲功能的单元格行为。低线供电时，上线获得供电。当低线是无动力，上线返回到自然状态。
v1.7.1版下载

- [1.7.3] RedPower Array Server V1.7.1 (Requires Core, Wiring, Logic)

需要：Risugami's ModLoader Flan's Unofficial ModLoaderMp Client Verison. MinecraftForge V1.0.5 or later.

If you are looking for Integrated Redstone, it is called RedPower Logic now.
It's still the same mod, but with a new name.



Installation安装↓
Single Player or Network Client Installation:
These go in minecraft.jar, YOU NEED ALL THREE:
需要
- Install Risugami's ModLoader                                
- Install Flan's Unofficial ModLoaderMp Client Verison. 
- Install MinecraftForge V1.0.3 or later (forum thread)
Now download the parts you want and put the zip files in your mods directory (NOT in the jar):
下 载
                                                                                                         
- [1.7.3] RedPower Core V1.6.0
红石电缆 核心                                                  
- [1.7.3] RedPower Logic V1.6.0 (Requires Core)
红石电缆 逻辑                                                            
- [1.7.3] RedPower Wiring V1.6.0 (Requires Core)红石电缆 布线                                                           
- [1.7.3] RedPower Lighting V1.6.0 (Requires Core)、
红石电缆 灯饰                                                           

A configuration file is created when you run it the first time.
You can use this file to change the block IDs, item IDs, disable click sounds,
or use an alternate recipe for crafting red alloy.




RedPower Logic  红石电缆 逻辑http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t8FfdHU8DMI&feature=player_embeddedAlso consult the 谘询Official Wiki.






零件
为了使用逻辑红石电路，你需要开始制造零件。
Wafer 硅片：




y0t1e.png (1.18 KB, 下载次数: 10)

下载附件

2011-8-9 17:37 上传





Wire电线：

Cathode阴极：

Anode阳极：

Pointer指针：


Tools
螺丝刀

Make yourself a screwdriver to rotate your logic tiles easily! Also, in a pinch, it does as much damage as a stone sword, although it's terrible for the life of the tool, so stab that zombie in the eye!


Logic circuits逻辑电路
Redstone Timer红石定时器

Sends out a pulse at a user-specified time interval. Powering it stops the clock. Two sides are both input and output, one side is output only, and one side is input only.在用户指定的时间间隔发送一个脉冲。开启电源停止时钟。双方都输入和输出，也可以一边是只输出，一边是只输入。

Redstone Sequencer红石序列发生器

Alternates between each of four sides in sequence at a user-specified speed. Since it is synchronized to world time, it also makes a handy clock - simply set it to 300 seconds.
在用户指定的速度之间的四边顺序交替。由于它与世界时间同步，这也成为一个方便的时钟 - 只需将它设置为300秒。

Pulse Former脉冲器

Emits a short pulse when the input turns on. The pulse is sent instantaneously, which also makes it useful as a fast repeater, and because the pulse is so short, placing two back to back allows pulses to be sent in both directions.
开启输入端时，会发出一个短脉冲。瞬间脉冲发送，这也使得它作为一种快速的中继器有用的，因为脉冲是如此之短，把两个背靠背可让两个方向上发送脉冲。


RS LatchRS锁存器

RS NOR latch. Turning on an input changes state. Turning on both inputs burns it out.
RS的NOR锁存器。接通一个输入端状态发生改变。接通两个输入端它将烧伤。

Toggle Latch翻转锁存器

Changes state when the input turns on. Can also be clicked to change state manually.
当输入导通时，改变状态。也可以点击手动改变状态。


NOR Gate或非门

The output is on when all inputs are off. Can be clicked to disable some inputs.
当所有输入端均为输出时。可以点击禁用某些输入端。

NAND Gate与非门

The output is off when all inputs are on. Can be clicked to disable some inputs.
当所有的输入输出为OFF。可以点击禁用某些输入。

AND Gate与门

The output is on when all inputs are on. Can be clicked to disable some inputs.
当所有的输入都是输出。可以点击禁用某些输入。

OR Gate或门

The output is on when any input is on. Can be clicked to disable some inputs.
当所有的输入时输出。可以点击禁用某些输入。

XOR Gate异或门

The output is on when only one of the inputs is on.
当只有一个输入时直接输出（同样的状态）

XNOR Gate异或非门

The output is on when the two inputs match.输出时，两个输入相匹配。

NOT Gate非门

All three outputs are on when the input is off.所有三个输出输入时是关闭的。

Buffer Gate缓冲门

All three outputs are on when the input is on.所有三个输出输入时是开启的。

Multiplexer复用器

The center input selects which side input controls the output.该中心输入选择哪一方输入控制输出。

Counter计数器

Counts up by Increment for each pulse on one input, and down by Decrement for each pulse on the other. Clicking opens a GUI to allow the maximum count, increment, and decrement to be set. Each output is on when the pointer reaches the end of range in that direction.
为每一个输入，和向下递减其他的每个脉冲的脉冲增量计数。打开一个GUI设置允许的最大计数，增量和减量，。每个输出上，当指针到达范围，在这个方向。

RedPower Wiring红石电缆 布线
Better than redstone, place wires on walls or ceilings, hide them under cover plates, run them up to 255 blocks away. Insulate them to avoid interference, or bundle 16 into a single cable!
比红石更好，可以挂在墙壁或天花板上的电线，它们可以隐藏在盖板下，传输距离达255块。它们绝缘，以避免干扰，或16个捆绑成一个单一的电缆！






Regular redstone "wiring" is really a trail of dust sprinkled on the ground. Sure, it's convenient, but you lose all your energy from the resistance between the grains. And water can come along and wash it all away! Instead, if you add a little bit of metal to your redstone, you can get the mysterious and wonderful Red Alloy!红石“布线”如同洒在地面上的灰尘痕迹。当然，它的方便，但你失去你所有的能量在从晶粒之间的电阻。和水可以全部冲走！相反，如果添加了一个金属在您的红石上，你可以得到的神奇的红合金！

Red Alloy Ingot红合金锭:


Red Alloy is a soft, ductile, highly conductive metal. How conductive? 16 times the conductivity of regular redstone! While it's much too soft to make tools out of, it's easily made into wire:
红合金是一种柔软，有韧性，高导电性的金属。导电如何？ 有16倍常规红石传导性！虽然它的工具，它太软容易切成丝：

Red Alloy Wire红合金丝:（貌似无法用内置修改器调出）


Bare Red Alloy wires will connect to almost anything, and they will power the block that they are sitting on, in addition to the blocks they are actually connected to. In fact, they are capable of indirectlypowering or being powered indirectly from the block that they are sitting on. But only bare wires can sense or power indirectly!
裸露的红合金线将连接到几乎所有的东西，裸露的红合金线可以连接所有的电线或逻辑块

Still, sometimes you don't want to splash power everywhere, or sometimes you may wish to run wires right next to each other without connecting to each other. To accomplish this, simply wrap some wire in nice insulating wool! Use any color of wool, and the wire will match!
不过，有时你不想到处串连电力，或有时你可能希望运行线没有连接到对方彼此相邻。而要做到这一点，简单地将线包装在一些绝缘很好的羊毛里！使用任何颜色的羊毛，将匹配相应的电线！

Insulated Wire绝缘电线:（貌似无法用内置修改器调出）


Now insulated wire can only connect to things on their ends, and different colors of wire won't connect to each other. But lets say you want to run wires even closer together? Well, take a bunch of wires, and using your best cable lacing technique, bundle them into cables!
绝缘线只能连接在其两端的东西，和不同颜色的线不会互相连接。但是，你想要将线更加紧密地运行在一起吗？好了，拿一堆的电线，并使用您最好的电缆捆绑技术，捆绑成电缆！

Bundled Cables捆绑电缆:（貌似无法用内置修改器调出）


That's all well and good, but sometimes you want to hide your wiring from prying eyes! Well, look no further, simply construct some cover plates out of your choice of materials. Supports almost every solid block in Minecraft! Now available in your choice of 16 different colors, just use the color of insulated wire that you want.
这一切都很好，但有时你要隐藏的您的布线不被窥视！好了，看看没有进一步的，只需您选择的材料建造一些盖板。在Minecraft支持几乎所有的固体块！现在在您选择16种不同的颜色，只需要使用您想要的绝缘线的颜色。

Cover Plates盖板:


Cover plates will protect your wires from stray pickaxes. They also prevent unwanted connections even between bare wires, and with the exception of glass, you can even place more wires on top of cover plates, for even denser wiring jobs!
盖板保护杂散的线。他们还可以防止不必要的连接，甚至裸线之间，但玻璃除外。你甚至可以放置更多的电线在盖板上，甚至密集布线工作，！

不同的颜色灯！

Version History版本历史:

- IR tiles on any surface.
- Make IR tiles a little weaker.
- Crashes with wires near furnaces fixed.
- Fixed rotation of tops and bottoms.
- Lighting error on tops
- Allow exterior corners through water.
- Fix inside cover lighting.
- Glass cover plate edges no longer transparent when covered by other cover
plate.
- Add live textures for insulated wires.
- Fixed initialPlace crash.
- Fix redwire/redstone connection.
- Colored bundles.
- Fixed crash when creating wire at external corner.
- Added lamps
- Added two-pass rendering for lamps
- Free-standing cover plates
- Breaking texture on cover plates.
- Sneak disables GUIs
- No more item sprite overrides.
- Added a screwdriver to rotate tiles.
- New Covers: Dirt, Books, Clay, Netherrack, Logs, Soul Sand, Slab, Iron, Gold,
Diamond, Wool, Lapis
- Levers and buttons connect on any side.
- Apparent connection changes when inputs disabled.
- IR no longer indirectly powering from weak power.
- IR now indirect powers.
- Cover plates on IR circuits
- Improve RS nor latch.
- Use RedPower rendering library for IR
- Improve IR Delays/Timings.
- Don't send unnecessary data for bundles in SMP.
- Make the converter work.
- Added alternate crafting recipe for ingot.
